page.title: 13A NEW SHOP IN MILVERTON
page.content:
ON JUNE 1 1985 OUR NEW SHOP OPENED. WE SELL STUFFED ANIMALS, DRESSES, CHINA, JEWELLERY AND FOSSILS. THE PEOPLE BUY THINGS FROM NINE POUNDS TO TWO HUNDRED POUNDS FROM MY DAD. MY MUM HAS THINGS FROM FIFTY PENCE TO THIRTY FIVE P0UNDS. MY DAD LETS PEOPLE BRING IN DEAD ANIMALS TO BE SUFFED. WE FILL UP OUR FREEZER WITH ALL THE BIRDS AND ANIMALS. CUSTOMERS BUY ONLY GOOD THINGS BECAUSE MY DAD GETS GOOD THINGS.
IT OPENED AT TEN O'CLOCK AND WE SOLD FIVE THINGS BEFORE ONE O'CLOCK. WE OPENED UP AGAIN AT TWO O'CLOCK AFTER LUNCH. WE SOLD EIGHT THINGS BEFORE FIVE O'CLOCK. WE SOLD ONE OR TWO OF MY DADS THINGS. MY MUM SOLD MORE THAN MY DAD BUT MY DAD MADE MORE MONEY THAN MY MUM. WE GOT THIRTEEN CUSTOMERS IN OUR SHOP FOR THE OPENING.
